casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Leroy McNEIL. No. 37A87-6. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 2, 2005. Robert H. Hale, Jr., for McNeil. G. Patrick Murphy, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of April 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of May 2005."
